programme.title: Agatha Raisin
Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha Raisin: Created by M.C. Beaton. With Ashley Jensen, Matt McCooey, Mathew Horne, Jamie Glover. The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5015548/","name":"Agatha Raisin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI4ZmUwMGItZGJkYi00MGEyLTg2MGUtOWQ0Y2Y5N2M1MzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5015548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timothy-price-794-581328"},"dateCreated":"2016-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good clean fun...","reviewBody":"Come into this without ANY preconceptions, unlike some who obviously recognize it as being 'different to the books', so from a pure and fresh viewpoint, just a really good fun, lighthearted series. Fabulous settings, attractive eccentric cast, for not-at-all serious light hearted viewing - and sometimes you just NEED that - for me, can just say, much enjoyed, and hope they make more... Have also seen some compare it to Midsomer M., but no - this is much lighter - strong comic element. Maybe cross between Midsomer and Vicar of Dibley!? Only confusion - how DO they manage to find so much sun when they are filming in the UK - certainly enhances the Cotswolds (as if it needed it). Imagine the cast have great fun doing it - more please...\n\nFollow up! Why the h*ll haven't Sky taken up 2nd Series? Come ON!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-12-26","keywords":"based on series of novels,amateur detective,rural setting,village,cotswolds","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421332/","name":"Ashley Jensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1838009/","name":"Matt McCooey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1328703/","name":"Mathew Horne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0512059/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221332/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103820/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014429/","name":"M.C. Beaton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kissing Christmas Goodbye Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3285893913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Agatha Raisin is back with an all-new Christmas mystery! Fabulous settings, attractive eccentric cast, for not-at-all serious light hearted viewing - and sometimes you just NEED that - for me, can just say, much enjoyed, and hope they make more... Have also seen some compare it to Midsomer M., but no - this is much lighter - strong comic element. Maybe cross between Midsomer and Vicar of Dibley!? Only confusion - how DO they manage to find so much sun when they are filming in the UK - certainly enhances the Cotswolds (as if it needed it). Imagine the cast have great fun doing it - more please...\n\nFollow up! Why the h*ll haven't Sky taken up 2nd Series? programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što je otkriveno da je ministar ratne mornarice bio ozvučen tijekom tajnog sastanka, NCIS surađuje s NSA-inom analitičarkom Eleanor "Ellie" Bishop kako bi otkrili tko je za to odgovoran. Nakon što je otkriveno da je ministar ratne mornarice bio ozvučen tijekom tajnog sastanka, NCIS surađuje s NSA-inom analitičarkom Eleanor "Ellie" Bishop kako bi otkrili tko je za to odgovoran.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Šesta sezona kreće od vrućeg ljeta 1959. g., kada je sezona vjenčanja bila u punom jeku. Dok vikar spaja sretne parove, detektiv Geordie Keating je zauzet istragom više slučaja ubojstava. U petoj sezoni u Grantchesteru se pojavljuje novi vikar - Will Davenport čovjek blizak ljudima i pun ideala te ga ubrzo privuče detektiv inspektor Geordie Keating i njegov svijet ubojitih zapleta, zločina iz strasti i neočekivanih tragedija.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: Jedinica za biheviorističke analize dobila je poziv da dođe u Teksas kako bi svojim savjetima pomogla u rješavanju ubojstava prostitutki. Dokazi upućuju na to da su ubojstva povezana s vjerom. No kako... Jedinica za biheviorističke analize dobila je poziv da dođe u Teksas kako bi svojim savjetima pomogla u rješavanju ubojstava prostitutki. Dokazi upućuju na to da su ubojstva povezana s vjerom. No kako istraga ide dalje, životi članova tima u sve su većoj opasnosti.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Nakon što je kćer iz bogate obitelji oteta u pokušaju stjecanja slave na internetu, Maggie i OA otkrivaju otmičarov plan da ode mnogo dalje od otmice kako nikad ne bi bio zaboravljen. Nakon što je kćer iz bogate obitelji oteta u pokušaju stjecanja slave na internetu, Maggie i OA otkrivaju otmičarov plan da ode mnogo dalje od otmice kako nikad ne bi bio zaboravljen.

programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jcadams-3"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining. Engrossing. Well-written. It's an 8.5 on a 10-scale.","reviewBody":"Entertaining. Engrossing. Well-written. The plot portrays seemingly credible situations. I give this show an 8.0 on a 10-scale. And I'll probably rate it higher in a few weeks if they can keep up the quality. And the lead actor --- Michael Weatherly who plays Dr. Bull --- is really excellent. Mr. Weatherly makes Dr. Bull out to be a little cocky but still a very likable person. And let me make it clear that I ain't no fan of the real Dr. Phil who is the actual model for the fictional Dr. Bull. (I find Dr. Phil's overbearing personality a little hard to take.) The sad truth, however, is that real jury consultants and "hired-gun" expert witnesses charge such high fees that they can only work for big corporations and wealthy clients. People who are not nice and have bad stuff to hide. Such as companies that pollute rivers. And nasty banks that cheat plain folks with toxic mortgage deals. Etc.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jcadams-3"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining. Engrossing. Well-written. It's an 8.5 on a 10-scale.","reviewBody":"Entertaining. Engrossing. Well-written. The plot portrays seemingly credible situations. I give this show an 8.0 on a 10-scale. And I'll probably rate it higher in a few weeks if they can keep up the quality. And the lead actor --- Michael Weatherly who plays Dr. Bull --- is really excellent. Mr. Weatherly makes Dr. Bull out to be a little cocky but still a very likable person. And let me make it clear that I ain't no fan of the real Dr. Phil who is the actual model for the fictional Dr. Bull. (I find Dr. Phil's overbearing personality a little hard to take.) The sad truth, however, is that real jury consultants and "hired-gun" expert witnesses charge such high fees that they can only work for big corporations and wealthy clients. People who are not nice and have bad stuff to hide. Such as companies that pollute rivers. And nasty banks that cheat plain folks with toxic mortgage deals. Etc.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17439,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

credits.actor: Jude Demorest, Brittany O'Grady, Ryan Destiny, Amiyah Scott, Quincy Brown, Miss Lawrence, Luke James, Lance Gross
Danny Masterson, Michael Cassidy, Adam Busch, Meredith Hagner, James Lesure, Alexandra Breckenridge, Richard Riehle, Nicolai Dorian

programme.title: Zaposleni dečki
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Serija prati nezgode četvorice prijatelja koji zajedno rade u časopisu. U skupini su nedavno ostavljeni Milo, osjetljivi Neal, duhoviti Tyler i ženskar Gibbs. Dečki možda ne pogode svaki put, ali obično se zabave.

credits.actor: Jane Kaczmarek, Bryan Cranston, Christopher Masterson, Justin Berfield, Erik Per Sullivan, Frankie Muniz, Hayden Panettiere, Harold Sylvester

programme.title: Moderna obitelj
programme.desc: Moderna obitelj prati živote Jaya Pritchetta i njegove obitelji. Ona uključuje njegovu drugu ženu, posinka, malog sina i njegovo dvoje odrasle djece te njihove supružnike i djecu. Moderna obitelj prati živote Jaya Pritchetta i njegove obitelji. Ona uključuje njegovu drugu ženu, posinka, malog sina i njegovo dvoje odrasle djece te njihove supružnike i djecu.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. programme.title: Simpsoni
programme.desc: Satiričke pustolovine obitelji iz radničke klase u gradu punom čudaka, Springfieldu. SIMPSONI nastavljaju pogađati žicu gledateljima kroz ismijavanje svega i svakoga. Kao najduže prikazivana serija u povijesti televizije, SIMPSONI su postali konstantna, inovativna i prepoznatljiva franšiza u cijelom svijetu.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
Transformersi 3: Tamna strana Mjeseca
programme.desc:
Transformers: Dark of the Moon: Directed by Michael Bay. With Shia LaBeouf, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Josh Duhamel, John Turturro. The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1399103/","name":"Transformers: Dark of the Moon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwOTY0MTc1NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQwNjA2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1399103/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gavin-thelordofthefu-48-460297"},"dateCreated":"2013-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bit of an improvement over ROTF, but not nearly as good as the first","reviewBody":"In order to coincide with a fourth Transformers coming out in the next few months, I'll be reviewing this third entry of the successful film series. I liked the first Transformers despite it's cheesy dialog in some parts and while there were some awkward moments and very bad dialog, I still liked Revenge of the Fallen. Then, when I saw the whole thing in theaters back at 2011, I thought, this wasn't so bad after all. It later turned out to be a good ride, but while I do think it's a bit of an improvement over the previous film, it's nowhere near as good as the first.

First, there are some good things that saved the film for me. The music score from Steve Jablonsky has improved and has an epic tone to it. The story is a lot more decent than the previous film with a much better second and third halves; the action sequences are solid especially the collapsing building scene which took my very breath away. The scenery is great and the special effects are as top-notch as ever. The acting is good, too. While John Turturo, Franches McDormand, and John Malkovich aren't given much to do, they did fine with the material. Patrick Dempsey did OK as the villain, but he's a bit underwhelming. Rosie Hunter Whiteley is a bit bland, but not exactly terrible as the new girlfriend for Sam Witwicky. While Shia LeBeouf isn't as charismatic as he was in the first film, he does have the same charm he brought to the film series so far. The Autobots and Decepticons are great to see again and the voice actors are solid especially Leonard Nimoy as Sentinal Prime, who is a very good villain for the movie much Megatron.

Then, there are the bad things that I would point out. First, the script. While the second and third halves are a lot better, the first half is pretty boring. It seems to be lacking in it's action and it wasn't exciting. Second, the ending is way too similar to the first Transformers (what? with the auto-bots and decepticons fight against each other while bringing destruction to the city and such?) The pacing is also very sluggish it would almost put you to sleep. Third and mostly the final problem is the dialog. There are some humorous bits that might get the audience a chuckle, but there are other parts that are just so inane it would give you a headache.

Overall, Transformers: DOTM isn't nearly as good as the first, but despite the flaws that I just stated, I think this is a great sequel in an overall solid franchise. I may not be a fan of Michael Bay and such, but while I do not like the Bad Boys films, Pearl Harbor, and others, I think that this and the other films are a lot better and it deserves a recommendation to those who haven't seen it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-29","keywords":"job interview,year 1969,optimus prime character,robert f. kennedy character,megatron character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543989017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the Moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and learn its secrets, which could turn the tide in the Transformers' final battle."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2492819/","name":"Rosie Huntington-Whiteley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879085/","name":"Tyrese Gibson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"}],"duration":"PT2H34M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Shia LaBeouf, Josh Duhamel, John Turturro, Tyrese Gibson, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Patrick Dempsey, Frances McDormand, John Malkovich

I liked the first Transformers despite it's cheesy dialog in some parts and while there were some awkward moments and very bad dialog, I still liked Revenge of the Fallen. Then, when I saw the whole thing in theaters back at 2011, I thought, this wasn't so bad after all. It later turned out to be a good ride, but while I do think it's a bit of an improvement over the previous film, it's nowhere near as good as the first.

First, there are some good things that saved the film for me. The music score from Steve Jablonsky has improved and has an epic tone to it. The story is a lot more decent than the previous film with a much better second and third halves; the action sequences are solid especially the collapsing building scene which took my very breath away. The scenery is great and the special effects are as top-notch as ever. The acting is good, too. While John Turturo, Franches McDormand, and John Malkovich aren't given much to do, they did fine with the material. Patrick Dempsey did OK as the villain, but he's a bit underwhelming. Rosie Hunter Whiteley is a bit bland, but not exactly terrible as the new girlfriend for Sam Witwicky. While Shia LeBeouf isn't as charismatic as he was in the first film, he does have the same charm he brought to the film series so far. The Autobots and Decepticons are great to see again and the voice actors are solid especially Leonard Nimoy as Sentinal Prime, who is a very good villain for the movie much Megatron.

Then, there are the bad things that I would point out. First, the script. While the second and third halves are a lot better, the first half is pretty boring. It seems to be lacking in it's action and it wasn't exciting. Second, the ending is way too similar to the first Transformers (what? with the auto-bots and decepticons fight against each other while bringing destruction to the city and such?) The pacing is also very sluggish it would almost put you to sleep. Third and mostly the final problem is the dialog. There are some humorous bits that might get the audience a chuckle, but there are other parts that are just so inane it would give you a headache.

Overall, Transformers: DOTM isn't nearly as good as the first, but despite the flaws that I just stated, I think this is a great sequel in an overall solid franchise. I may not be a fan of Michael Bay and such, but while I do not like the Bad Boys films, Pearl Harbor, and others, I think that this and the other films are a lot better and it deserves a recommendation to those who haven't seen it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":395947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-29","keywords":"job interview,year 1969,optimus prime character,robert f. kennedy character,megatron character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi543989017","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYyOTgwOTExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDQ0NzcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the Moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and learn its secrets, which could turn the tide in the Transformers' final battle.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0479471/","name":"Shia LaBeouf","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2492819/","name":"Rosie Huntington-Whiteley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879085/","name":"Tyrese Gibson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000881/","name":"Michael Bay"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0130376/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0472567/","name":"Ehren Kruger"],"duration":"PT2H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Saw V
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Saw V: Directed by David Hackl. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell. Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. That is why I can only give this movie a 5 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"tied to a table,self surgery,jigsaw character,amanda young character,repeat sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw V: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi627179545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Saw V, directed by David Hackl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666398/","name":"Scott Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352524/","name":"David Hackl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. That is why I can only give this movie a 5 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"tied to a table,self surgery,jigsaw character,amanda young character,repeat sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw V: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi627179545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Saw V, directed by David Hackl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666398/","name":"Scott Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352524/","name":"David Hackl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Zaposleni dečki
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Serija prati nezgode četvorice prijatelja koji zajedno rade u časopisu. U skupini su nedavno ostavljeni Milo, osjetljivi Neal, duhoviti Tyler i ženskar Gibbs. Dečki možda ne pogode svaki put, ali obično se zabave.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

programme.title: Simpsoni
programme.desc: Satiričke pustolovine obitelji iz radničke klase u gradu punom čudaka, Springfieldu. SIMPSONI nastavljaju pogađati žicu gledateljima kroz ismijavanje svega i svakoga. Kao najduže prikazivana serija u povijesti televizije, SIMPSONI su postali konstantna, inovativna i prepoznatljiva franšiza u cijelom svijetu.

programme.title: Saw V
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Saw V: Directed by David Hackl. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell. Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM","dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

programme.title: Saw V
CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Saw V: Directed by David Hackl. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell. Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. That is why I can only give this movie a 5 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"tied to a table,self surgery,jigsaw character,amanda young character,repeat sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw V: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi627179545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Saw V, directed by David Hackl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666398/","name":"Scott Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352524/","name":"David Hackl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: The Terminator
Terminator
programme.desc: The Terminator: Directed by James Cameron. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Biehn, Linda Hamilton, Paul Winfield. A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088247/","name":"The Terminator","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTViNzMxZjEtZGEwNy00MDNiLWIzNGQtZDY2MjQ1OWViZjFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088247/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"invisibleunicornninja"},"dateCreated":"2018-03-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Old, but still good.","reviewBody":"This movie is a solid action movie. Not all of the dialogue is great and some of the effects are a bit dated - but this movie is still effective. The acting is great. The plot is great. This movie is well-shot and worth watching. I can't really come up with many things that are bad about it that don't have to do with it being old. This is just a fun movie with good action, time travel, and robots. I'd definitely recommend this movie. programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: Bezbrižan život neženje i ženskaroša zavijek se promijeni nakon što se k njemu usele njegov brat i 10-godišnji nećak. Bezbrižan život neženje i ženskaroša zavijek se promijeni nakon što se k njemu usele njegov brat i 10-godišnji nećak.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! Grey's Anatomy has everything: drama, comedy, mystery, scandal and thrill."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":281334,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."}}</script><metacontent="

This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Dnevnik Bridget Jones
programme.desc:
Bridget Jones's Diary: Directed by Sharon Maguire. With Renée Zellweger, Gemma Jones, Celia Imrie, James Faulkner. Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243155/","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjc3NjU1ZTEtNmNjNi00YzNiLWI3OWQtMTJmYTRkZDc1NDE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bridget Jones is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243155/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kwongers"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightful, witty, and sexy  a TRIUMPH!","reviewBody":"As a huge fan of the books, I had incredibly high expectations of the movie. In order for the movie to work for me, it had to capture Bridget's plucky-heroine character and the hilarious-poignant emotions that are in the book. Needless to say, `Bridget Jones's Diary' the movie worked very, very, very well. Although Helen Fielding also wrote the screenplay (w/ Richard Curtis, very skilled with romantic comedies) and keeps the laughs coming, this movie could have fallen flat on its face. But it doesn't because one, the casting is absolutely divine and two, smartly builds on some elements the book downplays. 

	 Renee Zellweger is absolutely perfect as Bridget Jones. She has always been one of my favorite actresses and here, she totally displays Bridget's pathetic cuteness. Zellweger gained weight for this role, too, so she looks adorably plump. It's very, very hard to not fall in love with her the moment you see her at her family's Christmas party or drinking alone at home or listening to sad, Celine Dion music. (You have a heart of stone if you aren't moved to laughs or tears or pity for her.) I can't imagine anyone else playing Bridget Jones. Zellweger fits the role because she is very much normal and approachable we can relate to her. 

As Daniel Cleaver (her caddish Cassanova lover/boss), Hugh Grant is smoldering and hilarious. (Ok, I might be a little biased because I've been in love with him for ages and ages, but you can't deny he is a great comedic actor.) There's no trace of his stuttering that we saw (and I loved) in `Four Weddings and a Funeral' or `Sense and Sensibility.' Grant morphs effortlessly into a cad that we all love to hate and all love to love. Yes, it's a paradox, but that is what Grant brings to his role. He makes being `bad' look so sexy. You can't take your eyes off him; he brings his own humor to his role. It's lovely, smoldering, and incredibly sexy. 

 Colin Firth is also a delight to watch onscreen as Mark Darcy (I think I might be in love with him, too). He is also sexy and smoldering, but not in the same wild, fiery way as Daniel Cleaver. Firth brings a very cute sweetness to his role. I don't know if it is his adorable face or his hair or the way he dresses or just the fact that he is a major sex symbol, but you can't help but fall in love with him the MOMENT you see him onscreen. There is also one very beautiful moment where he tells Bridget, `I like you very much just the way you are.' It's incredibly romantic and, for me, ranks right up there with Tom Cruise's `You complete me' in `Jerry Maguire.' He also has rather explosive chemistry with Renee Zellweger, which is moving and sexy all at the same time. (And, of course, the author Helen Fielding used Colin Firth as the basis for Mark Darcy, so it all works out marvelously.) 	

I also mentioned that the movie smartly builds on some elements that the book downplays. Yes, there are certain parts of the movie that cannot be found in the book, but I'm still glad they put them in the movie. Most of what they added doesn't necessarily build on plot but it does add to the characters. I don't want to give anything away because it's rather hilarious what unfolds onscreen. The movie is filmed in an almost Ally McBeal type of way but it remains true to the sincerity, cuteness, and pathetic naivete that Bridget Jones embodies. There are no pretensions. It's an entirely wonderful film. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":235706,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-10","keywords":"unfaithfulness,employer employee relationship,opposites attract,love triangle,book publishing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bridget Jones's Diary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi192783897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjg4ZGY2MWItNTJlYy00YTE1LTg2ZTAtZGIyNDEzYWYzZjNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Bridget Jones's Diary"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000424/","name":"Hugh Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0536632/","name":"Sharon Maguire"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0276144/","name":"Helen Fielding"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0203577/","name":"Andrew Davies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193485/","name":"Richard Curtis"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
Resident Evil: Osveta
programme.desc: Resident Evil: Retribution: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer. Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855325/","name":"Resident Evil: Retribution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0NjcwMWMtN2MyNC00ZmZjLWEwZTAtM2ExYWE1NDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chanakya-dwivedi"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is not even close to what you will be expecting!!","reviewBody":"I was eagerly looking forward to the 5th installment of this series and I am sorry to say that I have been really let down! Apart from the once in a while visuals, the movie has not been able to get even close to expectations. The first 10 minutes of the movie and you will start feeling disconnected from the movie already not caring at all what is gonna happen in the next scene. After resident evil 3 & 4, I was expecting a lot out of this installment and from Paul W.S. Anderson but he has not been able to live up the mark at all. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory. I would say that the only reason you would want to watch this movie is if you are a fan of the resident evil series and you don't mind wasting your money and time for the sake of this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory. I would say that the only reason you would want to watch this movie is if you are a fan of the resident evil series and you don't mind wasting your money and time for the sake of this series.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.\r\n","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
Pravna plavuša 2
programme.desc:
Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde: Directed by Charles Herman-Wurmfeld. With Reese Witherspoon, Sally Field, Regina King, Jennifer Coolidge. Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0333780/","name":"Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzExMjk0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTUzNDcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Elle Woods heads to Washington, D.C. to join the staff of a Representative in order to pass a bill to ban animal testing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0333780/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"3-D"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not good at all.","reviewBody":"Although I recognize the fact that I'm a guy and shouldn't like chick flicks anyway, Legally Blonde 2 was ridiculous on so many levels that after watching the movie I had to lower my head in shame.

The first LB movie, while not very funny, was still entertaining to watch because it actually had effort put into the storyline. It was interesting to see a fashion-obsessed blonde in pink apparently not fitting in at Harvard law school. They tried the same approach with LB2, only with her walking into congress buildings wearing her all pink outfits. However, since we've already seen that attempt at humor in the first movie, it just wasn't anything special.

Aside from that, the plot outline was horrible. Basically, Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is having an upcoming wedding where she plans to invite the mother of her pet dog. She discovers that the dog's mother is in a lab, where they were testing fingernail polish on the dog's nails. Elle got sad and was like 'I am going to go to DC and make it illegal for them to test on animals!' The viewer, however, doesn't really care, realizing that putting nail polish on a dog's nails really isn't that big of a deal, but hey.

I'm not trying to sound mean, but I just can't really think of anything good about this movie. Every single joke used in the movie was either not funny or recycled from the first one. The entire concept of the plot is just retarded. It even seemed Reese was half-assing her acting job through the movie, doing even worse than she did in the first film. Nobody else in the movie will be nominated for any Oscars, either.

It just seemed that some filmmaker wanted to cash in from the first movie's success, knowing that people will pay money to see this movie just because the first one was popular. All of the production team's effort went into marketing and hype and they just didn't put enough into the actual movie itself.

2 out of 10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64820,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-09-17","keywords":"congresswoman,transvestism,the white house,washington monument washington d.c.,naivete","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2581971225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDc2ZjhlYjMtODMxOS00OWE3LWIzMzUtZjJmNzFmNjQ2Zjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0379237/","name":"Charles Herman-Wurmfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093810/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0113005/","name":"Amanda Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0013996/","name":"Eve Ahlert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0236881/","name":"Dennis Drake"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

The idea of the villain poisoning the town's water supply with water striders is lame. Also, if I have to listen to Jackie Chan's rude partner(Jinnifer Love Hewett) complain,I'm going to scream.She was very pretty, but not likeable at all.When I was watching this movie, I felt like Jackie falling off that water tower. programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
Cijena straha
programme.desc:
The Sum of All Fears: Directed by Phil Alden Robinson. With Ian Mongrain, Russell Bobbitt, James Cromwell, Ken Jenkins. CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Maryland." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0164184/","name":"The Sum of All Fears","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmFiZDkyYWQtMGNkZi00YmZkLThjNzAtY2U1YTVmYmNlNThmL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"CIA analyst Jack Ryan must stop the plans of a Neo-Nazi faction that threatens to induce a catastrophic conflict between the United States and Russia's President by detonating a nuclear weapon at a football game in Baltimore, Marylan","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0164184/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"colan"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"the only good thing I can say about Ben Afleck is...","reviewBody":"Nobody can act like Ben Afleck like Ben Afleck can. I mean, as far as acting like a wooden emotionless awful actor as Ben Afleck is, nobody can act as good (or bad I guess depending how you look at it) as Ben Afleck.

But just making a casting choice of putting one of the worst actors of our times with the most hype of Ben Afleck acting like Ben Afleck (kinda the opposite of how Jack Ryan would be) the rest of the movie is also full of just horrible inaccuracies and goes so far from the book from whence it was adapted, the even call it part of the series is as laughable as calling say Space Balls part of the Star Wars series, only Space Balls was almost good, it certainly had better acting than, say, Ben Afleck. 

Which it's all a shame, it's clearly a big budget piece, the backdrops and some of the actors excepting the stereotypical, laughably bad Neo Nazis which, what a stupid choice to do considering the book's bad guys would be much more relevant in todays world (what the heck was Hollywood thinking?!?), you could feel the money being dropped into this clunker. Granted, it's not 100% laughably bad like, say, most movies Matthew McConaughey is in lately, say the uberly so bad even the actors were laughing at their lines "Sahara," I mean, that's a steaming pile of a movie there were it reeks of bad. This movie reeked of trying to be good but with a "leading man" (sic) choice like weak pathetic Afleck, then changing the story from the book, then implausibles about nukes and radiation, this flick devolved into one big "you've got to kidding me fest."

I'd give this movie a zero except the explosion and some of the hardware and aircraft looked cool, that and sadly IMDb doesn't, but should, allow zeros, and should go one step further and automatically give any movie Ben Afleck is in a zero."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-08-28","keywords":"nuclear explosion,nuclear bomb,nuclear threat,atomic bomb,russia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Sum of All Fears","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3270770969","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNmNmRlNTYtMGFmYy00YmJiLThkODYtNWMwYWQwN2ZjOGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDNmNmRlNTYtMGFmYy00YmJiLThkODYtNWMwYWQwN2ZjOGI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Sum of All Fears"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000151/","name":"Morgan Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1172817/","name":"Ian Mongrain"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004675/","name":"Phil Alden Robinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026101/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067370/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002007/","name":"Tom Clancy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002417/","name":"Daniel Pyne"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator
Alien protiv Predatora - Requiem
programme.desc: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem: Directed by Colin Strause, Greg Strause. With Steven Pasquale, Reiko Aylesworth, John Ortiz, Johnny Lewis. Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0758730/","name":"AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5NDY2NDUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzQxMTA3._V1_.jpg","description":"Warring Alien and Predator races descend on a rural Colorado town, where unsuspecting residents must band together for any chance of survival.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0758730/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AaronCapenBanner"},"dateCreated":"2013-08-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"What Did You Expect Would Happen?","reviewBody":"If the Aliens ever got loose on Earth, I fully expect them to create the exact kind of havoc and destruction that they perform here, and some of it is gruesome indeed(the hospital for instance...) so since many fans wanted to see the Aliens on Earth, filmmakers granted them their wish, and what did they get back...lots of hate! I may be one of the few that liked this second(possibly last?!) AVP film, which picks up right where the previous film ended, with the Alien infested Predator ship crashing to Earth, unleashing Alien hordes on an unsuspecting and secluded Colorado town. A veteran Predator is then dispatched to Earth to clean up the mess, and cover up their involvement.\n\nI admit that the cast of unknowns may not grab you, but they are still reasonably interesting, and come off realistically, with elements that parallel earlier films in the series. Lots of good action, and plenty of scares, though I admit it is(literally) too dark at times, but then it is set at night in the rain! Much better than believed, and an ending that gives a nice bit of continuity for the fans...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":120805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2008-01-02","keywords":"predator,the predator character,murder of a pregnant woman,extraterrestrial,weapons fire","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi682754329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzY4MzQ4Njc5OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTIxODMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043855/","name":"Reiko Aylesworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1018679/","name":"Steven Pasquale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1560274/","name":"Shareeka Epps"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833779/","name":"Colin Strause"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833780/","name":"Greg Strause"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004307/","name":"Shane Salerno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0639321/","name":"Dan O'Bannon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0795953/","name":"Ronald Shusett"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Resident Evil: Retribution
Resident Evil: Prokletstvo
programme.desc: Resident Evil: Retribution: Directed by Paul W.S. Anderson. With Milla Jovovich, Sienna Guillory, Michelle Rodriguez, Aryana Engineer. Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1855325/","name":"Resident Evil: Retribution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY0NjcwMWMtN2MyNC00ZmZjLWEwZTAtM2ExYWE1NDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement to regain her freedom from an Umbrella Corporation testing facility.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1855325/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chanakya-dwivedi"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"It is not even close to what you will be expecting!!","reviewBody":"I was eagerly looking forward to the 5th installment of this series and I am sorry to say that I have been really let down! Apart from the once in a while visuals, the movie has not been able to get even close to expectations. The first 10 minutes of the movie and you will start feeling disconnected from the movie already not caring at all what is gonna happen in the next scene. After resident evil 3 & 4, I was expecting a lot out of this installment and from Paul W.S. Anderson but he has not been able to live up the mark at all. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory. I would say that the only reason you would want to watch this movie is if you are a fan of the resident evil series and you don't mind wasting your money and time for the sake of this series.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":138144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-09-14","keywords":"zombie,umbrella,corporation,rescue,fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3931415065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDk3MDA0N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM5MzQ5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000170/","name":"Milla Jovovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0347149/","name":"Sienna Guillory"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. Anderson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0368853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0368776/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027271/","name":"Paul W.S. The action scenes rather than being nail-biting, turned out to be hilarious and funny. There isn't a single moment in the movie where you are actually glued to screen. Milla Jovovich looks pretty as always, but that won't save the movie. All others have done a horrible job with their acting, especially Sienna Guillory.
