programme.title: RED 2
Red 2
programme.desc: RED 2: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Mary-Louise Parker, Helen Mirren. Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821694/","name":"RED 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2ODQ4ODY3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc2NzE1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A refreshing action comedy","reviewBody":"This film is about the missions of a bunch of retired ex-spies who are still extremely dangerous.\n\nIt's refreshing to have an action comedy! It's not easy to have all the killings and explosions happening, and yet maintaining a light hearted and fun tone. "Red 2" succeeds again in reaching the balance, making it enjoyable and fun. There are many cool scenes such as Helen Mirren firing guns with both hands towards opposite directions from a car. Mary Louise Parker's character is also fun, she seems not to know how to do anything but she is still so cool and funny. It's nice to see an action film having a big female presence, it's such a pleasant change. IMDb data; ttnr: 1821694, Title: RED 2, --- Description: RED 2: Directed by Dean Parisot. With Bruce Willis, John Malkovich, Mary-Louise Parker, Helen Mirren. Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821694/","name":"RED 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2ODQ4ODY3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc2NzE1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821694/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11","dateCreated":"2013-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A refreshing action comedy","reviewBody":"This film is about the missions of a bunch of retired ex-spies who are still extremely dangerous.\n\nIt's refreshing to have an action comedy! It's not easy to have all the killings and explosions happening, and yet maintaining a light hearted and fun tone. "Red 2" succeeds again in reaching the balance, making it enjoyable and fun. There are many cool scenes such as Helen Mirren firing guns with both hands towards opposite directions from a car. Mary Louise Parker's character is also fun, she seems not to know how to do anything but she is still so cool and funny. It's nice to see an action film having a big female presence, it's such a pleasant change. All the characters I enjoyed watching "Red 2", and maybe there will be another sequel?","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":166619,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-07-19","keywords":"color in title,reference to las vegas nevada,time bomb,cranberry,dc comics","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3200493849","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjIwMjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgzODMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MjIwMjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgzODMyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Retired C.I.A. agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000518/","name":"John Malkovich"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661751/","name":"Dean Parisot"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0117723/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388377/","name":"Jon Hoeber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388375/","name":"Erich Hoeber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1979137/","name":"Warren Ellis"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kristin's Christmas Past
Kristinin davni Božić
programme.desc:
Kristin's Christmas Past: Directed by Jim Fall. With Shiri Appleby, Will Kemp, Courtney Henggeler, Esperanza America. Given the opportunity to visit her estranged family on Christmas Eve 1996, Kristin Cartwright hopes to change her past in order to improve her current life in 2013." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3043594/","name":"Kristin's Christmas Past","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjMyMDQyNTczOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg4ODE3MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Given the opportunity to visit her estranged family on Christmas Eve 1996, Kristin Cartwright hopes to change her past in order to improve her current life in 2013.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3043594/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbabauzit"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Little masterpiece","reviewBody":"Story : Kris, a young woman who made wrong life choices at 17 (in 1996) ends up alone on Christmas at 34 (in 2013). She miraculously finds herself transported at her family home of Christmas 96 and meets her younger self, whom she will try and guide to avoid crucial mistakes and breaking up with her mother (and classicaly, 2 boys are involved...)

I happen to be a great fan of Shiri Appleby (Kris at 34), Elizabeth Mitchell (the mother) and a huge fan of AJ Langer, and all three deliver top performances. Hanna Marks (Kris 17) is quite entertaining too.

This movie is a teenage drama comedy about regrets, untold feelings and forgiveness, brilliantly interwoven, illustrating that afternoon TV movie can be superior art.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Romance"],"datePublished":"2013-11-23","keywords":"christmas,mother daughter conflict,mother daughter relationship,time travel,future self","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0032375/","name":"Shiri Appleby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0962261/","name":"Will Kemp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1136435/","name":"Courtney Henggeler"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266302/","name":"Jim Fall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0398200/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113573/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0836129/","name":"Rachel Stuhler"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

U želji da izlazi s muškarcem koji joj nije ravan, Margaret se pretvara da je drukčija nego što jest. Hanku se nije javio doktor u vezi opakog mladeža i on je uvjeren da su mu dani odbrojani. programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
Gospodin i gospođa Smith
programme.desc:
Mr. & Mrs. Smith: Directed by Doug Liman. With Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody. A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356910/","name":"Mr. & Mrs. Smith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMzcxNzQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQxNjUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356910/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carljessieson"},"dateCreated":"2010-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining as Hell!","reviewBody":"This is a daaaamn fun movie! Heh. To all the critics, yes, there are a lot of explosions, gunfire, unrealistic battles, plenty of times where you think "they MUST have been hit by a bullet by now..there is noo effin way...", and over-dramatized violence, but there's plenty of good stuff too that should not be ignored.

Probably the best part about this movie is the couple. I know it's been said before, but it's so true that I'm gonna repeat: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie have incredible chemistry. It's no wonder they're still together today. Even when the movie couple, John and Jane Smith, where in their "off period" of marriage, you could feel something between the two. They are an amazing screen couple, they work incredibly well together. Their dialogue is just right...when one says something to the other, it's smooth and real. And of course, Pitt and Jolie are both extremely attractive, so they're fun to watch. Haha.

The plot is all right..nothing extraordinary. It's a typical action movie plot, simple enough to leave plenty of room for the battle shots and violence. Nothing special. The dialogue wasn't bad, it wasn't lame action movie words. No stupid puns or anything. There was really nice cinematography, some shots that really were stunning. Usually the emotional aspect of action movies is dense and easy, cliché and boring, but I liked it in this movie. You could tell that they really loved each other, yet at the same time were committed to their jobs. You could feel the conflict.

I own this movie and I'm glad I do. It's a good time. I recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-06-08","keywords":"secret agent,character names as title,desert,surname in title,wife hits husband","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. and Mrs. Smith","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2627141913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111013/","name":"Adam Brody"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0356910, Title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith, --- Description: Mr. & Mrs. Smith: Directed by Doug Liman. With Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn, Adam Brody. A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0356910/","name":"Mr. & Mrs. Smith","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxMzcxNzQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzQxNjUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0356910/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"carljessieson","dateCreated":"2010-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining as Hell!","reviewBody":"This is a daaaamn fun movie! Heh. To all the critics, yes, there are a lot of explosions, gunfire, unrealistic battles, plenty of times where you think "they MUST have been hit by a bullet by now..there is noo effin way...", and over-dramatized violence, but there's plenty of good stuff too that should not be ignored.

Probably the best part about this movie is the couple. I know it's been said before, but it's so true that I'm gonna repeat: Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie have incredible chemistry. It's no wonder they're still together today. Even when the movie couple, John and Jane Smith, where in their "off period" of marriage, you could feel something between the two. They are an amazing screen couple, they work incredibly well together. Their dialogue is just right...when one says something to the other, it's smooth and real. And of course, Pitt and Jolie are both extremely attractive, so they're fun to watch. Haha.

The plot is all right..nothing extraordinary. It's a typical action movie plot, simple enough to leave plenty of room for the battle shots and violence. Nothing special. The dialogue wasn't bad, it wasn't lame action movie words. No stupid puns or anything. There was really nice cinematography, some shots that really were stunning. Usually the emotional aspect of action movies is dense and easy, cliché and boring, but I liked it in this movie. You could tell that they really loved each other, yet at the same time were committed to their jobs. You could feel the conflict.

I own this movie and I'm glad I do. It's a good time. I recommend it.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":472960,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2005-06-08","keywords":"secret agent,character names as title,desert,surname in title,wife hits husband","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mr. and Mrs. Smith","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2627141913","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU2NjIyNjItZTFkMy00M2IwLTkxNjItNmM1YjQ2YzM1OWZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111013/","name":"Adam Brody"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093488/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"],"duration":"PT2H"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Signs
Misteriozni znakovi
programme.desc: Signs: Directed by M. Night Shyamalan. With Mel Gibson, Joaquin Phoenix, Rory Culkin, Abigail Breslin. A widowed former priest living with his children and brother on a Pennsylvania farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields, which suggests something more frightening to come." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0286106/","name":"Signs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDUwMDUyMDAyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMDQ3NzM3._V1_.jpg","description":"A widowed former priest living with his children and brother on a Pennsylvania farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields, which suggests something more frightening to come.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286106/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bctitan04"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fantastic Movie","reviewBody":"This is definitely one of the best movies that I have seen in years. The dialogue is smart, the camera work is perfect and the information and background setting are divulged to the audience at precisely the right pace and exactly the right moment. Mel Gibson turns in his best performance that I can remember and so does Pheonix, who is extremely funny and plays a very real and well defined character. The movie is coincidently the scariest movie that I can remember seeing in theatres, and the scary moments are guaranteed to haunt you for a few days afterwards at least, but the movie is so much better than that and its so much more than a movie about aliens. As everyone knows from reviews, "Signs" means more than just crop signs, but "signs" are never portrayed in a cheesy way, but in a realistic and honest sense, and capturing such a deep topic without going overboard or making a mockery of it seems very hard these days, so that makes the film all the more impressive. Basically, its just awesome, it really is. Go see it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":351250,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2002-12-18","keywords":"crop circle,extraterrestrial,crop,faith,farm","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Signs","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi15335705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYyNzY4NDktMDc4NS00MjI3LThiZjgtZjYzYTY4NjE1MWJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODYyNzY4NDktMDc4NS00MjI3LThiZjgtZjYzYTY4NjE1MWJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001618/","name":"Joaquin Phoenix"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191412/","name":"Rory Culkin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796117/","name":"M. The dialogue is smart, the camera work is perfect and the information and background setting are divulged to the audience at precisely the right pace and exactly the right moment. Mel Gibson turns in his best performance that I can remember and so does Pheonix, who is extremely funny and plays a very real and well defined character. The movie is coincidently the scariest movie that I can remember seeing in theatres, and the scary moments are guaranteed to haunt you for a few days afterwards at least, but the movie is so much better than that and its so much more than a movie about aliens. As everyone knows from reviews, "Signs" means more than just crop signs, but "signs" are never portrayed in a cheesy way, but in a realistic and honest sense, and capturing such a deep topic without going overboard or making a mockery of it seems very hard these days, so that makes the film all the more impressive. Basically, its just awesome, it really is. programme.title: Zona e hedhjes
programme.desc: Wesley Snipes,Gary Busey. Në një botë plot me të fshehta të teknologjisë së lartë, mbijetesa e drejtesisë është në rrezik. Mes anarkise dhe rregullit qëndron një njeri i vetëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Aty ku fshihen Dragonjtë
programme.desc: Wes Bentley, Dougray Scott. Një gazetar investigativ zhgropos rastësisht sekrete të të atit, ndërsa heton mbi jetën e diskutueshme të themeluesin të organizatës "Opus Dei", gjatë Luftës Civile Spanjolle.
programme.category: Luftë
histori

programme.title: Në mendjen e errët
programme.desc: Tom Sizemore. Pasi një vajzë e re, nga viktimë kthehet në të akuzuar, babai i saj përpiqet të vendosë vetë drejtësi, por çdo gjurmë pafajësie është fshirë nga policë të korruptuar...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Armiku i padukshëm
programme.desc: 2009. Cuba Gooding Jr. Pas një aksidenti ku gruaja e tij shtatzënë humb jetën, një njeri zgjohet në spital me një mikroçip të instaluar në kokë. Bashkë me një grup rebelësh, ai bën të pamundurën të zbulojë të vërtetën, përpara se të jetë vonë.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Batman: Hallouini i gjatë, Pjesa I
programme.desc: Një vrasje brutale ditën e Hallouinit shtyn Batmanin të bashkojë forcat me dy ligjvënësit e vetëm të pakorruptuar të qytetit, për të rrëzuar familjen e krimit, Falcone. Por kur më shumë vdekje ndodhin gjatë festave, bëhet e qartë se ata kanë të bëjnë gjit.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aksion
krim

programme.title: Prapa vijës së armikut: Kolumbi
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2009: Tre marinsa janë të mbijetuarit e fundit nga një mision që shkon keq. Tani ata duhet të luftojnë me çdo mënyrë për të shpëtuar shokun e tyre të rrëmbyer dhe të provojnë pafajsinë për një krim që nuk e kanë kryer.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në gjueti për të vrarë
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Eric Roberts. Një grup të arratisurish, marrin peng një agjent të kufirit dhe vajzën e tij adoleshente dhe fshihen në pyll. Por instinkti për mbijetesë do ta bëjë agjentin të fillojë gjuetinë e hakmarrjes...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Star Trek VI: Drejt të panjohu
programme.desc: William Shatner. Ekuipazhi i Enterprise, është caktuar të shoqërojë një delegacion paqeje midis Federatës dhe Klingonëve. Por kur një zyrtar i lartë vritet nën kujdesin e tyre, gjithçka do të rrezikohet nga fillimi i një lufte tjetër.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion

programme.title: Pertej horizontit
programme.desc: Pasi një pjesë e popullsisë së Los Anxhelosit rrëmbehet nga alienet, një dektektiv sulmon anijen kozmike për të shpëtuar të birin. Kur mjetit alien rrëzohet, ai bën aleancë me të mbijetuarit për të zbuluar çelësin e shpëtimit të planetit.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
Aksion

programme.title: Syri i Shqiponjës
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf. Fatet e një nëne beqare dhe një djali të ri do të lidhen kur të dy marrin një telefonatë misterioze nga një grua e panjohur. Duke kërcënuar jetët dhe familjet e tyre, ajo i shtyn ata drejt situatave të rrezikshme, duke përdorur teknolog.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Pushtimi: Fundi i kohës
programme.desc: Vite pas rënies së një anije aliene në Tokë, jeta e një gruaje të re nga Moska ndryshoi rrënjësisht. Fuqitë e saj të reja e kanë bërë atë objekt studimi në Tokë, por interesi më i madh, vjen nga format e jetës përtej planetit, të cilët e shohin atë si kër.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Armik i pavdekshëm
programme.desc: 2017. Jackie Chan. Lin është një oficer policie në Hong Kongun modern. Me ndihmën e një hakeri, ai do të zbulojë lidhjen midis paisjes biokimike që i kanë vendosur të bijës, ushtrisë teknologjike të armikut të tij dhe fenomint të çuditshëm kulturor...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion

programme.title: Face off
programme.desc: J.Travolta, N.Cage. Kandidat për Oskar. Një agjent sekret përmes një operacioni plastik merr pamjen e një krimineli të rrezikshëm dhe futet në burg për të thithur ca informacione me rëndësi nga vëllai i tij që ndodhej brenda.
programme.category: Dy fytyrat e një vrasësi

programme.title: Binjakët
programme.desc: Nje instruktor karateje shkon me urgjence ne Kine per te takuar njeriun qe e rriti si birin e vet. Zbulon se ka nje vella binjak, te ndare kur prinderit e tyre u ekzekutuan brutalisht, dhe te dy bashke do te vendosin drejtesine ne vend.
programme.category: Jean-Claude Van Damme

programme.title: Unë jam Hakmarrja
programme.desc: 2020. Për të pastruar dosjen e tij kriminale, një ish ushtar i forcave speciale pranon të drejtojë një ekip special për të kapur një mercenar tradhtar dhe ta dorëzojë atë para drejtësisë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Me një këmbë në varr
programme.desc: Ata po vuajnë dënimin e tyre në burgun më të frikshëm në vend, 'Alkatrazi i Ri'. Problemi më i madh s'është të arratisen, por të përballen me hajdutet që sapo kanë hyrë. Një agjent dhe një i burgosur në anën e duhur të drejtesise.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Perandoresha dhe Luftëtarët
programme.desc: Pas vdekjes së babait, një grua detyrohet të bëhet perandoreshë dhe me ndihmën e luftëtarëve të saj trima, të mbrojë kombin që rrezikohet nga një luftë e përgjakshme...
programme.category: Kinemaja Aziatike

programme.title: I lindur për të garuar
programme.desc: Joseph Cross, John Pyper-Ferguson. Një adoleshent problematik i apasionuar pas garave me makina, kërkon ndihmën e babait që s'i fliste prej kohësh, për t'u futur në rrugë të drejtë dhe për të fituar garën më të rëndësishme...

programme.desc: Vrasësi i njohur si "Holiday" vazhdon të përndjekë familjen e krimit, Falkone, ndërsa një klasë e re kriminelësh po fuqizohet në qytetin e Gothamit. Vigjilenti Batmani ka filluar të ketë dyshimet e para se kush mund të jetë vrasësi që po terrorizon të gji.

programme.title: Mr. Bean, pjesët më të mira

programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Film pa zë
programme.desc: Mel Brooks. Parodi e filmave pa zë. Një regjisor, karriera e të cilit ka perënduar, kërkon të realizojë një film pa zë edhe pse ka mbi 40 vjet që nuk prodhohen më.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Zjarrfikësit 2
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, Massimo Boldi, Christian De Sica. Skuadra 17, rikthehet me aventura të reja. Tashmë ata janë zjarrfikës të vërtetë, por ama nuk i kanë lënë pas gabimet dhe keqkuptimet...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Të dua Beth Kuper
programme.desc: Gjatë fjalimit në marrjen e diplomave, Denis një adoleshent jo shumë popullor i shpreh dashurinë vajzës më të bukur të shkollës, Beth Kuper. E prekur nga fjalimi, ajo vendos ta ftojë atë për të kaluar një natë plot argëtim e aventura.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ankormeni
programme.desc: Ron Burungundy eshte kthyer ne legjende ne San Diego. Sipas tij, gruaja e ka vendin ne kuzhine! Ndonjera qe guxon t'i thote vetes gazetare, le te merret me shfaqjen e modes, me rubriken e gatimit dhe kaq!
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zoçkat e bardha
programme.desc: Sh. Wayans, M. Wayans. Një komplot po thuret dhe motrat Uilson, trashëgimtaret e një hoteli janë në rrezik. Dy agjente të FBI do të hyjne në veprim....do të bëhen motra. Një komedi brilante dhe zoçka të bardha që ta heqin trurin.
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: Krishtlindje '90-të
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi, Diego Abatantuono. Në një hotel luksoz gjatë festave të Krishtlindjes, historitë e ndërlikuara të disa kilentëve do të ndërthuren, duke krijuar kështu situata nga më komiket...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: E morët vesh për Morganët?
programme.desc: Hugh Grant, Sarah Jessica Parker. Martesa e një çifti Nju Jorkez, s'po shkon aspak mirë, por pasi bëhen dëshmitarë të një vrasjeje, duan apo s'duan ata futen në programin e mbrojtjes së dëshmitarëve dhe shpërngulen në një qytezë të qetë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vajza katastrofë
programme.desc: Amy Schumer, Bill Hader. Gjithmonë duke menduar se monogamia nuk ishte e mundur, nje vajzë e re takohet me një doktor simpatik, që mund t'i ndryshojë mendim...
programme.category: Romancë
komedi

programme.title: Mes dy Fierësh: Filmi
programme.desc: I armatosur me pyetje ngacmuese dhe aspak profesoniste, komediani Zach Galifianakis niset për të intervistuar njerëz të fashmëm të profilit të lartë, për të vënë në vend reputacionin e tij dhe të shfaqes me buxhet të ulët që ai drejton.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Bekuar qoftë injoranca
programme.desc: 2017. Marco Giallini, Alessandro Gassman. Dy profesorë rivalë fillojnë mes tyre një luftë të hapur: njëri duhet të dalë nga rrjetet sociale në internet pa të cilat nuk bën dot, e tjetri duhet të futet në to edhe pse nuk ia ka idenë fare.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Road trip
programme.desc: Katër shokë do të nisin një udhëtim të gjatë plot surpriza për të shtënë në dorë një kasetë me materiale të pahijshme postuar gabimisht përpara se kjo të bjerë në duart e të dashurës së mikut të tyre.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Nipçja i gjyshes
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2006. Allen Covert, Linda Cardellini. Pasi shoku i dhomës shpenzon paratë e qirasë, një 35 vjeçar detyrohet të jetojë me gjyshen dhe dy shoqet e saj, duke filluar kështu një aventurë që s'do ta harrojë lehtë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mr. Bean në telashe
programme.desc: Rowan Atkinson, në rolin e tij më të pëlqyer nga publiku. Jeta për Mr. Bean, është një sfidë dhe kudo ku ai shkon gjithçka kthehet përmbys. E megjithë këto, falë këmbënguljes së tij, ai gjithmonë gjen një zgjidhje...
programme.category: Serial komik

programme.title: Miki sykaltri
programme.desc: H.Grant. Një drejtues ankandi e gjen veten të përfshirë me mafian pasi mëson se e dashura e tij është vajza e 1 mafiozi. Gjerat ngatërrohen kur kumbari i saj vendos të përdorë ankandin për të reklamuar veprat e djalit të tij të patalentuar.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Arma e mbushur
programme.desc: Emilio Estevez, Samuel L. Jackson. Parodi e filmit "Arma vdekjeprurëse". Dy policë përpiqen të zgjidhin një çështje që ka të bëjë me recetën e gatimit të ëmbëlsirave me kokainë...
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Kokë e këmbë në dashuri
programme.desc: Monica Potter. Një vajzë e re bie në dashuri me një djalë pavaresisht se mendon se ai është përfshire në një vrasje.
programme.category: Komedi
romance

programme.title: 2500 vjet më parë
programme.desc: Christian De Sica, Massimo Boldi, Leslie Nielsen. Roma para 2500 vjetësh ishte djepi i kulturës, dijes dhe zhvillimit. Por kishte edhe shumë gjëra që s'shkonin dhe për çudi nuk ndryshonte shumë nga ditët e sotme...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Loja e dashurisë
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon. Lindsi është një këshilltare biznesi ambicioze. Beni është mësues në gjimnaz. Historia e tyre është nga ato dashuritë e mëdha derisa Lindsi zbulon se ka një rivale.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: I dobët në pafundësi
programme.desc: Bazuar në romanin e Stephen King. Një avokat i suksesshëm, pa dashje shtyp me makinë një cigane dhe merr nga babai i saj një mallkim të tmerrshëm, që po e gërryen nga dita në ditë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Maskat 2: Gjahtarët e natës
programme.desc: Christina Hendricks. Ekskursioni i një familjeje merr një kthesë të rrezikshme kur ata zgjedhin të kalojnë natën në një parking rulotësh. Tre psikopatë të maskuar sprovojnë limitet e familjarëve ndërsa ata luftojnë për mbijetesë.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Tatuisti
programme.desc: Jason Behr, Mia Blake. Përpjekjet e nje të riu për të mësuar artin e tatuazheve Samoa, çlirojnë një shpirt vdekjeprurës. Ndërkohë që klientët e tij po vdesin një e nga një, ai duhet të gjejë një zgjidhje për të shpëtuar të dashurën.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Kohë vrasjesh
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey, Sandra Bullock, Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey. Një avokat i ri mbron një mullixhi zezak sepse ka vrare dy burra të bardhë që i përdhunuan vajzen tij 10 vjecare.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Fëmijët e errësirës
programme.desc: Julia Stiles, Scott Speedman. Një çift shpërngulet në Kolumbi bashkë me vajzën e vogël për t'u kujdesur për një plantacion të familjes dhe shumë shpjet zbulojnë se shtëpia e tyre e re fshesh një sekret të tmerrshëm.
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Markat
programme.desc: Në një shoqëri ku korporatat gjigante kontrollojnë gjithçka, një njeri zbulon konspiracionin e rrezikshëm. Por këmbëngulja e tij për të treguar të vërtetën do ta përballë me forca të errëta sekrete, të cilat nuk ndalen përpara askujt.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
thriller

programme.title: Një njeri i zakonshëm
programme.desc: 2013. Ben Kingsley, Ben Cross, Patrick Rutnam. Një njeri i mistershëm, vendos 5 bomba nëpër qytet, të cilat do t'i shpërthejë nëse nuk lirohen 4 terroristë të burgosur.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: E Zhdukura
programme.desc: 2012.Amanda Seyfried. Pasi motra e saj zhduket pa asnjë gjurmë, një vajzë e re beson se vrasësi, të cilit ajo i shpëtoi është kthyer sërish. Me policinë që nuk i beson asnjë fjalë, ajo nis të kërkojë të motrën, përpara se të jetë shumë vonë...
programme.category: Thriller
mister

programme.title: E rrëmbyera
programme.desc: 2014. Ryan Reynolds. Zhdukja e Kasandrës përçau lidhjen e prinderve te saj. Por tetë vjet pas rrëmbimit të vajzës së tyre, ata marrin të dhëna enigmatike nga pengmarrësi, që lënë të kuptohet se ajo është ende gjallë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Hakmarrja e burrit
programme.desc: 2017. Një fermer irlandez i moshës së mesme, tepër i sjellshëm dhe i përkushtuar ndaj nënës së tij, nis një hakmarrje të përgjakshme pasi ajo vritet gjatë një përpjekje për të grabitur shtëpinë e tyre.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Shtëpia e ligë
programme.desc: Liam Neeson, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Owen Wilson. Disa njerëz pranojnë të bëhen pjesë e një studimi për pagjumësinë, por zbulojnë tmerrin e vërtetë kur doktor Marrou, u tregon për shpirtrat djallëzorë që gjenden në shtëpi.
programme.category: Thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Deadpool 2
Deadpool 2
programme.desc:
Deadpool 2: Directed by David Leitch. With Ryan Reynolds, Josh Brolin, Morena Baccarin, Julian Dennison. Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5463162/","name":"Deadpool 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkzNmRhNTMtZDI4NC00Zjg1LTgxM2QtMjYxZDQ3OWJlMDRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU5MjkzMTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (a.k.a. Deadpool) assembles a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg Cable.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5463162/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DeadMansTrousers"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Honest review of all 3 versions","reviewBody":"It's true that you can have too much of a good thing...please no more different editions!

THEATRICAL CUT - was the best version of any of the "cuts" it was the most cleanly edited and it had the best soundtrack out of the three. It is clear after seeing all the versions of the film that they tested all of the jokes and the ones included were cherry picked, and the best were picked to be included in this one.

SUPER DUPER CUT/EXTENDED - this was supposed to be an extended version of the film but it was actually a different cut...what I mean by that is that they changed the soundtrack and they cut out what I considered to be some of the funniest jokes from the theatrical cut and replaced them. They ALSO added some additional footage to the film after making those changes. This version of the film feels darker and less funny to me personally so I prefer the theatrical cut over it.

ONCE UPON A DEADPOOL/PG13 - This is the edition that nobody asked for and is the most unnecessary. From an editing standpoint this version of film is very sloppy, and seems like one giant montage. They don't even start this version of the film out at the beginning it jumps right into the "safe room scene". A lot of the footage included in this edition was already available on the home releases and online (apart from the short amount filmed with Fred Savage). The movie would end up edited on TV regardless of this edition existing or not. So in reality there was no need for this edition to exist apart from making more money.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":524952,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2018-05-18","keywords":"anti hero,japanese girl,based on comic book,marvel comics,superhero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984557081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YwNzViMzEtYTEyMS00MWIyLTkzY2UtZTRlMWViNTJlNGMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1yb3NzZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Deadpool 2' is heading back to theaters for 12 days from Dec. 12, 2018, re-cut for a PG-13 audience. In new scenes, Fred Savage will be seen alongside Deadpool, in an homage to Savage's starring role in the 'The Princess Bride.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000982/","name":"Josh Brolin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500610/","name":"David Leitch"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0566686/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014201/","name":"Rhett Reese"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1116660/","name":"Paul Wernick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The World Is Not Enough
Svijet nije dovoljan
programme.desc:
The World Is Not Enough: Directed by Michael Apted. With Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards. James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0143145/","name":"The World Is Not Enough","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzUyNjg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY5MDg0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0143145/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Nazi_Fighter_David"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":""I thought Christmas only comes once a year."","reviewBody":"The film opens with a formidable assassin who had recently posed as a banker's secretary She had given Bond a cigar, before killing her boss in the Swiss banker's office in Bilbao, Spain 

Now, when a bomb blew a hole in MI6's London headquarters, the super spy sped off in the Q boat, ignoring Q's plaintive cry, "Stop" Stop! It isn't finished!" It was Q's fishing boat for his retirement There's a splendid boat chase along the River Thames between 007 and the stunning Maria Grazia Cucinotta, the "Cigar Girl"  who worked as a barmaid at the village inn in "Il Postino." Bond was eager to capture her for questioning 

When a bomb planted in a briefcase of money killing British oil tycoon Robert King, M was determined to bring the perpetrators to justice The prime suspect was Renard who had once kidnapped King's daughter, Elektra M (Judi Dench) believed Elektra was next on Renard's list and 007 was assigned to act as her "shadow" while she supervised the building of an oil pipeline in Azerbaijan Yet despite his powerful urge to protect her, there was something about this beautiful, cunning, willful woman that aroused his suspicions 

Bond flew to Azerbaijan, where King Industries was building an oil pipeline Elektra gave 007 a 'cold' reception, taking him up into the snowy peaks to the pass where the two ends of the pipeline would soon meet... It was then that unsocial 'visitors' struck 

Sophie Marceau plays the magnate's daughter Elecktra who had once escaped Renard's clutches all by herself Her favorite motto: "There's no point in living if you can't feel alive."

Robert Carlyle plays Renard, the former KGB hit-man who had set up his own organization and demanded fanatical loyalty He was a murderer, a terrorist, and a kidnapper His only goal was chaos Subordinated who failed him killed themselves rather than face his wrath After Robert King came to see M, she sent 009 to kill Renard 009 caught up with him and put a bullet in his head The bullet was now killing off all his senses and was impervious to pain Renard was determined to pull off one last coup against the West But his motivations were motivated by blind hatred, or blind love? 

Goldie plays Bull, Zukovsky's shifty, gold-toothed bodyguard He was a menace to his boss and an important Renard spy 

Denise Richards plays Christmas Jones, the sexy atomic scientist overseeing the dismantling of the Kazakhstan nuclear test site Dr. Jones became an invaluable ally of 007's following Renard's theft of a nuclear bomb 

For "The World Is Not Enough," Q equipped Bond with the faster car 007 had ever been entrusted with: the MBW Z8, armed with a radar-guided missile system... 

Robbie Coltrane returns as the duplicitous Russian black marketeer Valentin Zukovsky whose ebony walking gun stick seemed a typically showy affection - but it had its uses... 

A final sad note: "The World Is Not Enough," marked the final appearance of the beloved Desmond Llewelyn, who acted from 1964 to 1995, except for "Live and Let Die." IMDb data; ttnr: 0143145, Title: The World Is Not Enough, --- Description: The World Is Not Enough: Directed by Michael Apted. With Pierce Brosnan, Sophie Marceau, Robert Carlyle, Denise Richards. James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0143145/","name":"The World Is Not Enough","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA0MzUyNjg0MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY5MDg0NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot while protecting an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0143145/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Nazi_Fighter_David","dateCreated":"2007-11-04","inLanguage":"English","name":""I thought Christmas only comes once a year."","reviewBody":"The film opens with a formidable assassin who had recently posed as a banker's secretary She had given Bond a cigar, before killing her boss in the Swiss banker's office in Bilbao, Spain 

Now, when a bomb blew a hole in MI6's London headquarters, the super spy sped off in the Q boat, ignoring Q's plaintive cry, "Stop" Stop! It isn't finished!" It was Q's fishing boat for his retirement There's a splendid boat chase along the River Thames between 007 and the stunning Maria Grazia Cucinotta, the "Cigar Girl"  who worked as a barmaid at the village inn in "Il Postino." Bond was eager to capture her for questioning 

When a bomb planted in a briefcase of money killing British oil tycoon Robert King, M was determined to bring the perpetrators to justice The prime suspect was Renard who had once kidnapped King's daughter, Elektra M (Judi Dench) believed Elektra was next on Renard's list and 007 was assigned to act as her "shadow" while she supervised the building of an oil pipeline in Azerbaijan Yet despite his powerful urge to protect her, there was something about this beautiful, cunning, willful woman that aroused his suspicions 

Bond flew to Azerbaijan, where King Industries was building an oil pipeline Elektra gave 007 a 'cold' reception, taking him up into the snowy peaks to the pass where the two ends of the pipeline would soon meet... It was then that unsocial 'visitors' struck 

Sophie Marceau plays the magnate's daughter Elecktra who had once escaped Renard's clutches all by herself Her favorite motto: "There's no point in living if you can't feel alive."

Robert Carlyle plays Renard, the former KGB hit-man who had set up his own organization and demanded fanatical loyalty He was a murderer, a terrorist, and a kidnapper His only goal was chaos Subordinated who failed him killed themselves rather than face his wrath After Robert King came to see M, she sent 009 to kill Renard 009 caught up with him and put a bullet in his head The bullet was now killing off all his senses and was impervious to pain Renard was determined to pull off one last coup against the West But his motivations were motivated by blind hatred, or blind love? 

Goldie plays Bull, Zukovsky's shifty, gold-toothed bodyguard He was a menace to his boss and an important Renard spy 

Denise Richards plays Christmas Jones, the sexy atomic scientist overseeing the dismantling of the Kazakhstan nuclear test site Dr. Jones became an invaluable ally of 007's following Renard's theft of a nuclear bomb 

For "The World Is Not Enough," Q equipped Bond with the faster car 007 had ever been entrusted with: the MBW Z8, armed with a radar-guided missile system... 

Robbie Coltrane returns as the duplicitous Russian black marketeer Valentin Zukovsky whose ebony walking gun stick seemed a typically showy affection - but it had its uses... 

A final sad note: "The World Is Not Enough," marked the final appearance of the beloved Desmond Llewelyn, who acted from 1964 to 1995, except for "Live and Let Die." A perfect foil to 007's lighthearted nature Q has been one of the series' most enduring character...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":196261,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-01-09","keywords":"official bond film,007,bilbao spain,femme fatale,false identity","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The World Is Not Enough","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2709954841","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWIwYzZiNmItZjg1Mi00Y2E1LTg2YjgtNWYzMWMxZDQ4N2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWIwYzZiNmItZjg1Mi00Y2E1LTg2YjgtNWYzMWMxZDQ4N2IzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Clip: Caviar Factory And Giant Saw","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000521/","name":"Sophie Marceau","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000776/","name":"Michael Apted"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024134/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270761/","name":"Bruce Feirstein"],"duration":"PT2H8M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Monsters University
Čudovišta sa sveučilišta
programme.desc:
Monsters University: Directed by Dan Scanlon. With Billy Crystal, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi, Helen Mirren. A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1453405/","name":"Monsters University","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyODgwMDU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTM4MjcxOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the relationship between Mike Wazowski (Billy Crystal) and James P. "Sully" Sullivan (John Goodman) during their days at Monsters University, when they weren't necessarily the best of friends.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1453405/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"clumbj"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nostalgic film for the old and young","reviewBody":"The first Monsters Inc. came out when i was just 7 years old and immediately became one of my all time favourites from the day I saw it. With extremely high expectations in mind and excitement especially for Pixar's close attention to relevance (as I am actually at university now myself) I went to see the new one as soon as it came out.

The film is a prequel following closely to our much loved earlier Characters, Mike and later Sully as they present to us their lives prior to the first movie. As well as an adorable new cast of monsters which are equally lovable as the old ones.

To my delight, the film exceeded most if not all my earlier expectations. The plot is well written, funny and most of all extremely heart warming especially to long time fans like myself as well as those younger viewers that might not have even seen the first one.

The nostalgic element of the film is perhaps the most well written. Every twist and turn reveals a huge or tiny explanation to the events and habits of the characters that I previously saw in the first film. Questions I never even asked myself, like why Randall's eyes are so squinty or how Sully and Randall's rivalry originated. 

Although i absolutely loved the movie, perhaps its because I've waited for 12 years but at some points it left me slightly unsatisfied and I'd have loved for some parts to be explained more thoroughly. 

Regardless of my only criticism, the movie made me laugh, cried with tears of joy, almost actually cried and was both heart warming and action packed. What more could you ask for? I urge those fans of the first film as well as anyone that just wants to have a good time at the cinema to see it. It'll be well worth your time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":340716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2013-06-19","keywords":"1980s,monster,university,fraternity,cheating","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final [Exam] Trailer ","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2206049817","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc3MzY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTYzOTk1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNTc3MzY3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTYzOTk1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Mike Wazowski and James P. Sullivan are an inseparable pair, but that wasn't always the case. From the moment these two mismatched monsters met they couldn't stand each other. Monsters University unlocks the door to how Mike and Sulley overcame their differences and became the best of friends."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000345/","name":"Billy Crystal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000114/","name":"Steve Buscemi"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0768959/","name":"Dan Scanlon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0768959/","name":"Dan Scanlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314870/","name":"Daniel Gerson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0047916/","name":"Robert L. Baird"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
Ponos i predrasude
programme.desc:
Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Incredibles
Izbavitelji
programme.desc:
The Incredibles: Directed by Brad Bird. With Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Samuel L. Jackson, Jason Lee. A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317705/","name":"The Incredibles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY5OTU0OTc2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4MDcyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317705/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sargebri"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Truly, Pardon the Pun, Incredible Movie","reviewBody":"This is one of the finest animated films I have ever seen. Not only is it a fine animated film, it is a great film period. The film obviously takes its cue from several real life super hero comic books, especially The Fantastic Four and the Justice Society of America. The Fantastic Four comparison is obvious due to the fact that Elatigirl and Violet were obviously inspired by Mr. Fantastic (aka. Reed Richards) and the Invisible Woman (aka. Sue Storm Richards) respectively. The J.S.A. influence is a little more obscure. Several years ago, DC Comics issued a mini-series that attempted to explain the demise of the Justice Society by claiming that the group was forced to disband after their loyalty to America was questioned during the 1950's. In this film, all the heroes were forced into hiding after the government refused to pay for wrongful legal claims brought against the super heroes of this film. Also, there are many in jokes that the casual viewer might not get, but that made it enjoyable for comic book fans. This the island scenes look as if they could have been inspired by many of the series produced by Gerry Anderson of the 1960's (eg. the Thunderbirds and Captain Scarlet).

Another thing that made this film unique was its look. If you notice, the city where the story takes place looks like a fairly modern metropolis. However, if you look at the cars in the film, most of them look as if they would have been more at home in the mid to late 1960's. Also, the way that many of the characters were dressed also could have put them in that time.

However, the thing that I really loved about this film was the fact that even though it was geared primarily to children, it was dark enough in theme to appeal to adults. In fact, there are a couple of scenes that you wouldn't normally associate with a film geared towards children.

This film is definitely a classic of animation and once again Pixar shows why they are the masters of computer animation."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":685301,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2005-01-05","keywords":"superhero family,superhero,non comic book superhero,secret identity,cgi animation","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Incredibles: Blu-ray Release","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2963250457","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk2ZmY4MTMtZDRmNy00YWM1LThmZWUtMWM3ZmViNzA3ZjU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk2ZmY4MTMtZDRmNy00YWM1LThmZWUtMWM3ZmViNzA3ZjU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Nomanisan Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005266/","name":"Craig T. Nelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Die Another Day
Umri drugi dan
programme.desc:
Die Another Day: Directed by Lee Tamahori. With Pierce Brosnan, Halle Berry, Toby Stephens, Rosamund Pike. James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0246460/","name":"Die Another Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODNkYmIwYTMtYzdhNy00YWE3LThkYmEtNzA5ZTE5YmVjYzZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul, who is funding the development of an international space weapon.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0246460/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cariart"},"dateCreated":"2004-05-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fourth Brosnan 'Bond' Starts Promisingly, but Falters...","reviewBody":"Creating new, exciting adventures for 007 after 20 feature films in forty years is a difficult task at best, particularly as public tastes change, and the character of James Bond has to maintain at least a degree of the 'persona' created by Ian Fleming. While the heirs of Albert Broccoli, his daughter Barbara and son-in-law Michael G. Wilson, have done a remarkable job in keeping the series 'fresh', if DIE ANOTHER DAY is any indication, the creative forces surrounding them seem to be losing 'touch' with James Bond, and his world.

After an astonishing pre-title sequence, climaxing with Bond being captured by the North Koreans, the film offers a horrendous montage of torture, with Bond only surviving due to a timely prisoner exchange (with an unsympathetic M remarking, "If it had been up to me, you'd have stayed in North Korea...", obviously forgetting that 007 had saved her life in THE WORLD IS NOT ENOUGH). Pierce Brosnan, at fifty, is superb in this sequence, vulnerable yet defiant, and to this point, DIE ANOTHER DAY has all the makings of a first-class Bond entry.

Then Bond jaunts off to find the agent who betrayed him, becoming involved in an investigation involving diamonds, solar power, and a 'too-good-to-be-true' industrialist (smarmy Toby Stephens), and all of the creativity of the opening is lost, with the film becoming an uneasy mix of references to past films and silly, unbelievable situations, sets and gadgets (culminating with an 'Ice Palace' and an 'invisible' Aston Martin).

As she had won an Oscar prior to filming DIE ANOTHER DAY, sexy Halle Berry, 36, was publicized extensively as Bond's latest leading lady, CIA agent 'Jinx'. Unfortunately, after a spectacular 'rising from the waves' introduction (borrowed from Ursula Andress, in DR. NO), and a few nicely choreographed fights, she spoke...and lost all of her credibility in the role. While much of the problem was certainly in the script, she was never believable as Bond's 'counterpart' in the American intelligence community. On the other hand, Rosamund Pike, 23, was both sexy and duplicitous as British double agent Miranda Frost, as chilly as her name, but capable of igniting under 007's gaze. In a part equally poorly written, she made far more of her scenes than the writers gave her. 

The most interesting character in the film was certainly Rick Yune, as Graves' 'enforcer', Zao. Charismatic, ruthless, and nearly unstoppable, Zao was nearly a primal force, far more menacing than Graves at his worst.

While a sword-fight sequence between Bond and Graves provided a rare film highlight, and certainly ranks as one of the film series' more memorable sequences, much of the rest of the production was silly, with the story set at a break-neck pace to 'hide' the absurdities. The climax, as a solar 'ray' destroyed the minefield between North and South Korea, allowing an 'invasion' to occur, as 007 and Jinx attempted to commandeer the aircraft controlling the 'ray', stands as one of the most ludicrous finales to a Bond film since MOONRAKER.

Although DIE ANOTHER DAY would become Pierce Brosnan's highest-grossing Bond, to date, the film, despite heavily promoting Halle Berry's presence, failed to crack the 'Top Ten' box office attractions in the U.S., and disappointed many fans, worldwide.

With the purchase of MGM by Sony, which has wanted to produce a Bond film for years (the studios were entangled in a legal suit that ended just as DIE began production), surprising changes were in store...CASINO ROYALE, the only Fleming title NOT owned by Eon Productions was named as the next 007 adventure...and Pierce Brosnan was FIRED (a sad finish for an actor who'd worked so hard to make 007 viable in the new millennium!) While Broccoli and Wilson are still 'in charge' of Bond productions, they have to answer to new bosses, with definite opinions of their own on where the franchise should go...Can 007 survive THIS? 

We can only wait and see!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":213748,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-01-01","keywords":"north korea,iceland,gadget car,british secret service,weaponised car","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Die Another Day","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225302809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MmU0MjItNTM2Yi00ZDc2LTgzMmYtYTljOTMxNDY3OWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY3MmU0MjItNTM2Yi00ZDc2LTgzMmYtYTljOTMxNDY3OWZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000112/","name":"Pierce Brosnan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000932/","name":"Halle Berry"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848414/","name":"Lee Tamahori"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054040/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024134/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001220/","name":"Ian Fleming"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Edge of Tomorrow: Directed by Doug Liman. With Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Brendan Gleeson, Bill Paxton. I had high expectations, was hoping for a decent sci-fi movie but instead I got a quite boring drama. I wouldn't say the actors were bad, far from that, Natalie Portman and the rest did their job, but the story was just weak, certainly for the first half of the movie. The movie was also much too long, certainly for the story they wanted to tell. I wouldn't waste too much time on this one if I were you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7051,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"astronaut,close up of eye,multiple aspect ratios,character name in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Now Playing Only In Theaters","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2276769561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjhjNDUxYWItMjkzOC00OWNlLTk2MzItOTRjMjMzMGJlZDhiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Lucy Cola's space mission leaves her deeply moved by the experience of seeing her life from afar. programme.title: Hancock
Henkok
programme.desc: Hancock: Directed by Peter Berg. With Will Smith, Charlize Theron, Jason Bateman, Jae Head. Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448157/","name":"Hancock","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgyMzc4ODU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjk5Mzc1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hancock is a superhero whose ill-considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when the person he saves helps him improve his public image.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kathleen-pangan"},"dateCreated":"2008-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"About a superhuman who is just very human","reviewBody":"Hancock was a pretty interesting as well as entertaining movie. It definitely wasn't your typical superhero movie; and it wasn't originally a DC or Marvel comic. It's more about what would happen if someone with superheroes was around in modern times, and that is what makes it interesting. If there's some property damage done while catching criminals, people will be angry; if a vigilante has a bad attitude, people will be angry. I suppose Batman explores some of that not being liked by the public, as well as the bad attitude and personal trauma of the hero, but I found Hancock to be quite original in its handling of these issues. I liked the media attention and the use of sunglasses as a "mask" of sorts. I really liked how Hancock progresses as a character, and I liked the other characters as well. Usually little kids in movies annoy me, but the son of the supporting character was pretty cute and endearing. This isn't really a hero movie where there is a superhero and a super villain; I think it's more about what it means to be a human and relate to other people, to do good things and the desire to be accepted. I think the best part of Hancock is that it's about a superhuman who is just very human. It was a lot of fun.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":463749,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2008-07-02","keywords":"superhero,black superhero,non comic book superhero,tough girl,destruction","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hancock: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2497904921","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MjY1MjU1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk2NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg3MjY1MjU1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjk2NzMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the second theatrical trailer for Hancock, directed by Peter Berg."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000234/","name":"Charlize Theron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000867/","name":"Jason Bateman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237209/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1378206/","name":"Vy Vincent Ngo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319213/","name":"Vince Gilligan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Freddie Rodriguez, Robert Steffey, Deliris Vasquez

programme.title: Axios
programme.desc: Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. O'Neilll i Peltz rade s vodećim Axiosovim novinarima kako bi stavili naglasak na politiku, biznis i tehnologiju sljedećeg tjedna - kao i velike teme koje oblikuju budućnost. Svako izdanje AXIOS-a pokriva aktualni veliki problem iza kojeg slijede kratki dokumentarci, poučni intervjui s važnim osobama te pouzdani uvidi preneseni AXIOS-ovom tipičnom "inteligentnom jezgrovitošću" u sažetom, djeljivom formatu.

programme.title: Arrival
Dolazak
programme.desc: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. IMDb data; ttnr: 2543164, Title: Arrival, --- Description: Arrival: Directed by Denis Villeneuve. With Amy Adams, Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg. A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2543164/","name":"Arrival","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTExMzU0ODcxNDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE1OTI4MzAy._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist works with the military to communicate with alien lifeforms after twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2543164/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"SilentEyes_","dateCreated":"2017-02-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"No CGI overkill, just some fine acting and directing","reviewBody":"Denis Villeneuve is without a doubt an upcoming director and I can't wait to see Blade Runner 2049. Prisoners, Sicario and now Arrival (haven't seen Enemy yet, or some of his earlier work). Denis knows how to capture the tension. It is almost the strongest point of all of his films. Minimal use of computer generated images, and main focus on story, characters, acting and thrilling scenes. Back on IMDb board, I have noticed a lot of people calling Arrival a boring movie. So many hypocrites these days. People trying to point out every possible flaw to look and sound smarter while at the same time hailing far worse movies. Calling it boring and slow while at the same time complaining no originality in Hollywood, only giant CGI laser explosions extravaganza. Go watch Independence Day. In Arrival there is no action, no explosions, just some amazing acting performances combined with good directing, editing and cinematography. There was not a single moment I felt bored.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":647859,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2016-11-11","keywords":"alien contact,linguistics,linguist,nonlinear timeline,based on short story","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4225807897","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzA4Mzg5OTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDk4ODg0MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0010736/","name":"Amy Adams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719637/","name":"Jeremy Renner","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001845/","name":"Forest Whitaker"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0898288/","name":"Denis Villeneuve"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0251858/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158853/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2104063/","name":"Eric Heisserer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5384213/","name":"Ted Chiang"],"duration":"PT1H56M"</script><metacontent="
